repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:6.3 
# Maintainer 
MAINTAINER Aksenchyk V. <aksenchyk.v@gmail.com> 

# Create app directory 
RUN mkdir -p /usr/src/app && rm -rf /usr/src/app
WORKDIR /usr/src/app 

# Install app dependencies 
COPY package.json /usr/src/app/ 
RUN npm install && npm cache clean --force;

# Bundle app source 
COPY . /usr/src/app 

EXPOSE 3006 
CMD [ "npm", "start" ]
